Key Match Events: Luis Gil pitched a no-hitter through 3.1 innings before allowing a double in the fourth
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees were facing a 6-for-34 (.176 batting average) slump with just two RBI, two extra-base hits and no home runs over his last nine games for Aaron Judge
Post-Match Reflections: Gil answered the call -- in his first start off the IL, no less -- and held the Cubs' high-scoring offense in check
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Rizzo received a warm welcome from the crowd of his former team in his first at-bat in the second inning
